articles.description: NCAA.com's Mike Lopresti breaks down the resiliency of Oral Roberts following the Golden Eagles' stunning comeback win over TCU in the opening round of the 2023 Men's College World Series.
articles.content: OMAHA, Neb.  Another defiant day, and Oral Roberts had ignored adversity and confounded logic yet again, this time on the big stage of the Men's College World Series. The players were piling back int… [+5438 chars]
